snippet: The company settled after it was accused of inappropriate billing and of providing care to nursing home residents that was effectively worthless.
abstract: Extendicare agrees to pay $38 million to resolve federal claims that it inappropriately billed for physical therapy and provided such poor care to residents that it was effectively worthless; company is one of nation's biggest nursing home chains.
lead_paragraph: The company settled after it was accused of inappropriate billing and of providing care to nursing home residents that was effectively worthless.

headline.main: Chain to Pay $38 Million Over Claims of Poor Care
headline.print_headline: Chain to Pay $38 Million Over Claims of Poor Care
